description: Perfect to spread over Christmas cookies and gingerbread, make up a batch of this 3-ingredient icing in just 5 minutes.
keywords: Icing & frosting,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Video,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Easy Christmas Cookie Icing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly whisk egg white and lemon juice together in a bowl. Gradually add icing sugar, whisking until smooth and combined. Spoon mixture into a piping bag fitted with a 2mm plain nozzle. Using the picture as a guide, decorate gingerbread with icing. Stand for 30 minutes or until set, then serve.
